name: paper-toast

text.name: text
text.description: The text shows in a toast.

duration.name: duration
duration.description: The duration in milliseconds to show the toast.

opened.name: opened
opened.description: Set opened to true to show the toast and to false to hide it.

responsiveWidth.name: responsiveWidth
responsiveWidth.description:
Min-width when the toast changes to narrow layout.  In narrow layout,
the toast fits at the bottom of the screen when opened.

swipeDisabled.name: swipeDisabled
swipeDisabled.description: If true, the toast can't be swiped.

autoCloseDisabled.name: autoCloseDisabled
autoCloseDisabled.description:
By default, the toast will close automatically if the user taps
outside it or presses the escape key. Disable this behavior by setting
the `autoCloseDisabled` property to true.

toggle.name: toggle
toggle.description: Toggle the opened state of the toast.

show.name: show
show.description: Show the toast for the specified duration

dismiss.name: dismiss
dismiss.description: Dismiss the toast and hide it.

core-overlay-open-completed.name: core-overlay-open-completed
core-overlay-open-completed.description: Fired when the `paper-toast` has completely opened.

core-overlay-close-completed.name: core-overlay-close-completed
core-overlay-close-completed.description: Fired when the `paper-toast` has completely closed.
